name: goodmorningtech
description: Get a daily dose of tech news in your mailbox! Good Morning Tech is a daily newsletter that delivers the most important tech news of the day. It's a great way to stay up to date with the latest tech news without having to spend hours on the internet. It's 100% automated and it's free! You can even set your time zone so that you get the news at the right time.
author: GoodMorningTech
